function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of governance and regulation for urban green spaces, particularly in relation to disease mitigation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited literature on the role of urban green spaces in disease provision and mitigation, particularly in latin america","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive environmental governance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited documentation of covid-19 mobility protocols in urban green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lethality of covid-19 in latin america","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased visitation to urban green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts between different groups of visitors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on urban green spaces for mental health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of real-time iaq monitoring can lead to delayed detection of unhealthy indoor air conditions, increasing the risk of exposure to contaminants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient iaq monitoring systems may result in prolonged exposure to poor indoor air quality, especially in rural areas where specific requirements may be overlooked.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and access to iaq monitoring systems for non-tech savvy individuals can hinder the adoption of preventive measures and lead to prolonged exposure to unhealthy indoor air.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on real-time iaq monitoring systems in real scenarios may lead to exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on designing suitable iaq management systems for village areas may lead to neglecting the health of rural populations and hindering overall medical health improvement efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive monitoring systems for contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of environmental factors on indoor air quality","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited knowledge of early research studies in the field of indoor air quality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Realtime monitoring of iaq parameters may introduce privacy concerns for building occupants.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on iot for realtime monitoring may lead to system failures, causing hazardous conditions to go undetected.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater interaction with the physical world through iot increases the risk of cyber attacks and unauthorized access to iaq monitoring systems.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on prediction systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low performance of non-iot based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High latency in wsn-based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iot based systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality iaq leading to potential health risks for residents","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weaknesses in existing iaq monitoring systems leading to unreliable data and potential health risks for residents","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper data transmission strategy may result in high power consumption and redundant network traffic.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-cost iaq monitor may have limited accuracy and reliability, leading to incorrect measurements of pollutants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and pollutant levels may go unnoticed due to limited monitoring parameters.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on statistical analysis software ibm spss statistics for data analysis may introduce errors or biases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of smart mobile standards, wsn, and other sensing technologies may introduce cybersecurity risks if not properly secured.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring for indoor air quality iaq parameters such as humidity, temperature, gaseous pollutants, and pm.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or delayed estimation of atmospheric changes and pollutants in indoor environments.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited or no access to real-time iaq monitoring and exposure risk updates for building occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper air quality monitoring leading to potential exposure to air contaminants and pollutants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality assessment leading to potential health risks from indoor pollutants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Usage of high integrity serial bus protocol can may lead to potential data breaches or security vulnerabilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of low-cost micro gas sensors and arduino microcontroller may result in inaccurate iaq monitoring and data quality issues.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless communication using zigbee module may introduce interference and communication disruptions in iaq monitoring system.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to poor air quality monitoring and control system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate air quality prediction leading to inadequate control measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on energy-saving performance validation test for system effectiveness","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of diseases due to contaminated air","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of air pollutants leading to improper management","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased health issues due to indoor air pollution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality parameters","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate monitoring of iaq parameters","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher concentration of vocs in buildings can lead to skin, throat, and respiratory irritation, as well as broader set of
